name: Wendy: Der Traum von Arizona
description:
Wendy: Der Traum von Arizona is an action-adventure for children of any age. You play the party of Wendy, a German children's cartoon star. She and her friend Bianca are dreaming of going on a riding holiday in Arizona. To get the money required for it, they have to win horse tournaments.

There are seven levels. They are divided into two types: There are action-adventure levels where you have to accomplish different tasks -- like helping your parents or shoeing your horse. To do this, you have to speak to different people, find and use items at the right location and succeed in some mini-games, all the while keeping a safe distance from evil animals (like sheep...) which hurt you when touched.

Between these action-adventure levels, there are the tournament levels in which you perform in several different riding disciplines, often with some qualification stage before.

At the end of the game, there is another arcade sequence in which you have to drive the taxi to the airport. If you have done this, you can enjoy the ending. After finishing the game, you can switch to a "tournament mode" where you can replay each tournament to get as much points as you can.

shot.caption: Title screen
Intro. Two young, horse-crazy girls on the phone. Bianca goes to Arizona to ride...
... Sweet Wendy would like to, but hasn't got enough money. Your task is to win tournaments to make money to go to the US.
Meeting Moms.
All animals are very dangerous and hurt when touched. Sheep too. This is not meant to be an educational game...
You have to fulfill certain tasks in each level, here it's feeding the ducks. Exciting!
After finishing a level, some graphics are shown to motivate you even more!
Level 2 is dressage training. Follow a certain line at the right speed. A trainer shows you how to do it.
Now it's Wendy's turn. Oops, wrong speed!
After the training, the real thing: Welcome to the tournament!
I won the tournament! Yay!
Next level. Mr. Smith seems to have lost his hammer.
The looks are deceiving: These cute little hoppers actually are killer bunnies.
Some kinda Pac Man clone with goose instead of ghosts.
Next Level: Staple chase. Press A as quickly as you can to get that horse galoppin', but be sure you don't forget to jump in time...
... otherwise, you lose valuable seconds.
Again, after managing the training, the tournament. Good luck!
Welcome to the Wild West Club! You need to get a cowboy hat. Chat with friendly cowboys...
... and grumpy barmen. Wanna drink?
Hmmm... I wonder why this snake does this. I hope it's not poisonous...
... of course it is! The only one that can save you is this wise old Indian.
Performing some magic to heal poor poisoned Wendy.
Huh, it's dark in here! (I made the graphics for this room.)
To get your cowboy hat, you have to show you're a real cowboy, er girl. Catch as many cows as you can with your lasso!
If you catch enough, you get the bar keeper's old cowboy hat.
Last discipline: Military! Ready, steady, go! Not too quick here, this game is hard.
Jump over fences, and rivers, and lots of other stuff.
One last thing: Safely drive your taxi to the airport. Don't imitate that Ferrari.
Finally... We've reached our destination.
After enjoying the outro, you get to play the "Vielseitigkeit": All disciplines again! Gee, that's fun. Follow them dots...
... jump 'em barriers...
... and jump 'em barriers some more...
... Then you get a total score...
... and if you're as good as me, you can even win some nice trophy! What a game!!
